content: the marker ssk decreased two stitches for a total of 40 stitches size 3 k1 k2tog knit until the last two stitches before the marker ssk decreased two stitches for a total of 44 stitches size 4 k1 k2tog knit until the last two stitches before the marker ssk decreased two stitches for a total of 48 stitches size 5 knit one plain row of knit stitches no adjustment needed size 6 k1 k2tog knit until the last two stitches before the marker ssk decreased two stitches for a total of 56 stitches size 7 k1 k2tog knit until the last two stitches before the marker ssk decreased two stitches for a total of 72 stitches size 8 k1 k2tog knit until the last two stitches before the marker ssk decreased two stitches for a total of 74 stitches size 9 k1 k2tog knit until the last two stitches before the marker ssk decreased two stitches for a total of 80 stitches sleeve hem border work the chart from right to left and bottom up 19 tsuki mountain fibres i 100% that witch sweater #thatwitchsweater ribbing decrease for a nice tight cuff you will be decreasing 10 stitches evenly before knitting the ribbing if you prefer the cuff at the stitch count it is you can skip this step cut mc & ccb knit with cca size 1 k1 k2tog k2 k2tog k1 7 times k2tog k2 k2tog should now have 22 stitches size 2 k1 k2tog k2 9 times k2tog k1 should now have 30 stitches size 3 k2 k2tog k2 3 times k2tog k3 3 times k2tog k2 3 times k2tog k1 should now have 34 stitches size 4 k2 k2tog k2 k2tog k3 7 times k2tog k2 k2tog k1 should now have 38 stitches size 5 & 6 k2 k2tog k4 3 times k2tog k3 3 times k2tog k4 3 times k2tog k1 should now have 46 stitches size 7 k3 k2tog k6 k2tog k5 7 times k2tog k6 k2tog k2 should now have 62 stitches size 8 k3 k2tog k6 2 times k2tog k5 5 times k2tog k6 2 times k2tog k2 should now have 64 stitches size 9 k3 k2tog k6 9 times k2tog k3 should now have 70 stitches sleeve ribbing switch to smaller needles and continue ribbing with cca *k1p1* for 13 row bobble using jssbo method or preferred stretchy bobble method of your choice repeat everything for the second sleeve finishing weave in ends wash block and cast all the spells 20 tsuki mountain fibres i 100% that witch sweater #thatwitchsweater contact info please don t be afraid to contact me with any questions about the pattern there are a few dif cid 0 ferent places i tend to lurk instagram @tsukimountain ravelry tsukiknits email tsukimountain@gmail com also i love seeing your projects please feel free to tag me on instagram or use the #thatwitchsweater so i can check out your awesome sweater or watch your progress if you re interested in
